titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Wheras diuers bookes made or translated by certayne the Queenes Maiesties subiectes, for the more part remayning on the other syde of the sea, without lawfull licence, contayning sundry matters repugnaunt to trueth, derogatorie to the soueraigne estate of her Maiestie, and stirring and nourishing sedition in this realme ...
Proclamations. 1569-03-01
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Churchyarde by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation forbidding importation of unlawful books.
